name: Admin Bar Queries
author: Carmelo Santana

sections.description: Adds MySQL queries, rendering time (in seconds), and CPU load to your admin bar. If installed on a multi-site installation, output is restricted to super admins.
sections.installation:
1. Install via the WordPress admin panel or download from the repository and upload to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.changelog:
0.5.21

  • Fixed Invalid argument supplied for foreach() when sys_getloadavg() is FALSE

0.5.2

  • Added CPU load as drop down element.

0.5.1

  • Fixed compatibility with php 5.2.4.
  • Changed timer action output priority to 999.
  • Reduced space needed for timer output.

0.5

  • Initial release

short_description: MySQL queries and load details added to your admin bar.
description: Adds MySQL queries, rendering time (in seconds), and CPU load to your admin bar. If installed on a multi-site installation, output is restricted to super admins.

screenshots.caption: MySQL queries and time (in seconds) spent rendering page output.
